entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
